description: Implemented cross-encoder re-ranker for fast_search. Created reranker.py module with lazy model loading (ms-marco-MiniLM-L6-v2), integrated with fast_search via `rerank=True` parameter, added 10 unit tests. Also fixed plan tool to return summaries on update/complete actions instead of full content (saves ~4.5KB per call). Re-ranker tested live and working - search results now show cross-encoder scores.
